Class MetricConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • MetricConversion
  • public class MetricConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Annice Najafi SWD-fall 2019 write an application that will assist the user with metric conversions. Your application should allow the user to specify the names of the units as strings (i.e., centimeters, liters, grams, and so on, for the metric system and inches, quarts, pounds, and so on, for the English system) and should respond to simple questions, such as "How many inches are in 2 meters?" Your application should recognize invalid conversions. For example, the question "how many feet are in 5 kilograms" is not meaningful

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static javax.swing.JFrame frame
      instance variable frame is a JFrame to include textfields for requests to be typed and JLabel to show the result
      private static java.lang.String result
      private static result is intended to hold the result of conversion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MetricConversion()
      constructor sets the size and background color of the frame

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static double advEnglishAreaToMetric​(java.lang.String command)
      This function can convert english area to Metric area, it receives a String and parses the string finds the number and converts the requested unit, function is static because there is no need for an object to be instantiated for the function to be used.
      static double advMetricAreaToEnglish​(java.lang.String command)
      This function can convert metric area to english area, it receives a String and parses the string finds the number and converts the requested unit, function is static because there is no need for an object to be instantiated for the function to be used.
      static double basicEnglishToMetric​(java.lang.String numWithUnits)
      this function can handle English to Metric conversion for mass and length
      static double basicMetricToEnglish​(java.lang.String numWithUnits)
      this function can handle Metric to English conversion for mass and length
      void runProgram()
      makes a frame and adds a textfield to the frame for the request to be typed then it will print the result of the conversion to a JLabel.
      static double tempConverter​(java.lang.String command)
      This function is intended to be used for temperature conversion if given temperature in fahrenheit it converts it to celsius or the other way
      void testProgram()
      This function asks the user to indicate what is their requested conversion, then it receives the request as a String

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • testProgram

        public void testProgram()
        This function asks the user to indicate what is their requested conversion, then it receives the request as a String

      • runProgram

        public void runProgram()
        makes a frame and adds a textfield to the frame for the request to be typed then it will print the result of the conversion to a JLabel. The typed request will be passed to the appropriate function based on the command

      • basicMetricToEnglish

        public static double basicMetricToEnglish​(java.lang.String numWithUnits)
        this function can handle Metric to English conversion for mass and length
        Parameters:
        numWithUnits - is the command handed to the function for example 5 meters to inches
        Returns:
        the number of equivalent English units

      • basicEnglishToMetric

        public static double basicEnglishToMetric​(java.lang.String numWithUnits)
        this function can handle English to Metric conversion for mass and length
        Parameters:
        numWithUnits - is the command handed to the function for example 5 inches to meters
        Returns:
        the number of equivalent metric units

      • advEnglishAreaToMetric

        public static double advEnglishAreaToMetric​(java.lang.String command)
        This function can convert english area to Metric area, it receives a String and parses the string finds the number and converts the requested unit, function is static because there is no need for an object to be instantiated for the function to be used. function uses another function to convert
        Parameters:
        command - is a String that includes information about the number and the initial unit and the unit we want to convert to
        Returns:
        double converted number

      • advMetricAreaToEnglish

        public static double advMetricAreaToEnglish​(java.lang.String command)
        This function can convert metric area to english area, it receives a String and parses the string finds the number and converts the requested unit, function is static because there is no need for an object to be instantiated for the function to be used. function uses another function to convert
        Parameters:
        command - is a String that includes information about the number and the initial unit and the unit we want to convert to
        Returns:
        double converted number

      • tempConverter

        public static double tempConverter​(java.lang.String command)
        This function is intended to be used for temperature conversion if given temperature in fahrenheit it converts it to celsius or the other way
        Parameters:
        command - is a String that will be parsed and processed
        Returns:
        double temperature in the other system
